member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.CallSiteFactory.ValidateTrimmingAnnotations(System.Type,System.Type[],System.Type,System.Type[])
member.summary: Validates that two generic type definitions have compatible trimming annotations on their generic arguments.
member.remarks: When open generic types are used in DI, there is an error when the concrete implementation type has [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] attributes on a generic argument type, but the interface/service type doesn't have matching annotations. The problem is that the trimmer doesn't see the members that need to be preserved on the type being passed to the generic argument. But when the interface/service type also has the annotations, the trimmer will see which members need to be preserved on the closed generic argument type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.ServiceCacheKey.Type
member.summary: Type of service being cached

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.ServiceCacheKey.Slot
member.summary: Reverse index of the service when resolved in IEnumerable<Type> where default instance gets slot 0. For example for service collection IService Impl1 IService Impl2 IService Impl3 We would get the following cache keys: Impl1 2 Impl2 1 Impl3 0

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.ServiceCacheKey.Equals(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.ServiceCacheKey)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current instance is equal to another instance of the same type.
member.param: An instance to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if the current instance is equal to the other instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring various behaviors of the default implementation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderOptions.ValidateScopes
member.summary: true to perform check verifying that scoped services never gets resolved from root provider; otherwise false. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderOptions.ValidateOnBuild
member.summary: true to perform check verifying that all services can be created during BuildServiceProvider call; otherwise false. Defaults to false. NOTE: this check doesn't verify open generics services.

member.name: P:System.SR.AmbiguousConstructorException
member.summary: Unable to activate type '{0}'. The following constructors are ambiguous:

member.name: P:System.SR.CannotResolveService
member.summary: Unable to resolve service for type '{0}' while attempting to activate '{1}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.CircularDependencyException
member.summary: A circular dependency was detected for the service of type '{0}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.UnableToActivateTypeException
member.summary: No constructor for type '{0}' can be instantiated using services from the service container and default values.

member.name: P:System.SR.OpenGenericServiceRequiresOpenGenericImplementation
member.summary: Open generic service type '{0}' requires registering an open generic implementation type.

member.name: P:System.SR.ArityOfOpenGenericServiceNotEqualArityOfOpenGenericImplementation
member.summary: Arity of open generic service type '{0}' does not equal arity of open generic implementation type '{1}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.TypeCannotBeActivated
member.summary: Cannot instantiate implementation type '{0}' for service type '{1}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.NoConstructorMatch
member.summary: A suitable constructor for type '{0}' could not be located. Ensure the type is concrete and services are registered for all parameters of a public constructor.

member.name: P:System.SR.ScopedInSingletonException
member.summary: Cannot consume {2} service '{0}' from {3} '{1}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.ScopedResolvedFromRootException
member.summary: Cannot resolve '{0}' from root provider because it requires {2} service '{1}'.

member.summary: Cannot resolve {1} service '{0}' from root provider.

member.summary: Implementation type '{0}' can't be converted to service type '{1}'

member.name: P:System.SR.TrimmingAnnotationsDoNotMatch
member.summary: Generic implementation type '{0}' has a DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute applied to a generic argument type, but the service type '{1}' doesn't have a matching DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute on its generic argument type.

member.name: P:System.SR.TrimmingAnnotationsDoNotMatch_NewConstraint
member.summary: Generic implementation type '{0}' has a DefaultConstructorConstraint ('new()' constraint), but the generic service type '{1}' doesn't.
